verse.name: v1
verse.lines: SAVIOR OF MY SOUL newline LOVER OF MY LIFE newline I LOVE YOU ENDLESSLY

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: PASSION OF MY HEART newline EVERYTHING YOU ARE newline I LOVE YOU ENDLESSLY

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: YOU LOVED ME BEFORE I KNEW OF YOU newline YOU LOVED ME NOW I GIVE IT BACK TO OU

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: WITH YOUR MAJESTY HERE newline I FALL TO MY KNEES newline I LOVE YOU ENDLESSLY

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: WITH THE BEAUTY OF YOUR SON newline I FIND MYSELF UNDONE newline I LOVE YOU ENDLESSLY
